problems.description: Implement Dijkstra's algorithm to find the shortest paths from a given source vertex to all other vertices in the undirected graph.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of a connected graph represented by its vertices - inp1 and weighted undirected edges - inp2, along with a source vertex - inp3.
problems.expected description: An object where each key is a vertex and its value is the shortest distance from the source vertex. Distances are shown as integers.
